component.name: Looksyk
component.summary: A markdown centric, fast and local personal knowledge platform

description.p: The app is a modern note-taking and knowledge management tool that enables structured capture, management, and search of notes and media. It offers numerous convenient features for efficient work and a customizable user interface.

ul.li: Create and organize notes and pages with flexible blocks
Intelligent search and suggestion functions (content assist)
Backlink and reference system for networked knowledge
Customizable design (e.g., light/dark mode, custom CSS)
Media management with detailed view and download
Support for large files and various file types
Sync your graph into a git repository
Change default locations of the graph-directory, aswell as the config directory (using environment variables first, then xdf environment variables and hard-coded paths)
Update dependencies of backend, frontend and application-wrapper
Bugfix: De-duplicate history entries in sidebar again
Bugfix: Fix journal titles in loading state to show Loading... instead of undefined
Initial FlatHub Release and AppImageHub Release

screenshot.caption: Initial starting point of Looksyk: The journal page.
A content assist supports the insertion of content while typing
Many file types are supported: In addition to images, videos, audios and PDFs, also archived websites
